function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increase in suicidal thoughts during lockdown","Impact":"Potential increase in suicides or self-harm","Mitigation":"Provide mental health support and outreach services, raise awareness, and promote community connections","Technologies":"Telehealth platforms, mental health apps, virtual support groups","People":"Individuals experiencing mental health challenges during lockdown","Owner":"Healthcare providers, mental health organizations"},{"Description":"Housing precarity and poor neighborhood quality amplifying health risks","Impact":"Increased risk of stress, anxiety, depression, and weakened immune system","Mitigation":"Implement measures to prevent eviction, improve housing conditions, and address neighborhood quality","Technologies":"Community development initiatives, housing assistance programs, public health campaigns","People":"Individuals at risk of eviction, living in poor-quality neighborhoods","Owner":"Local governments, community organizations, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Association of eviction threat with increased stress and weakened immune system","Impact":"Elevated levels of stress, anxiety, and depression, leading to higher susceptibility to Covid-19 contagion and mortality","Mitigation":"Provide support for individuals facing eviction, offer mental health resources, and address social determinants of health","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mental health hotlines, community outreach platforms","People":"Individuals facing eviction and displacement during Covid-19","Owner":"Social service agencies, mental health professionals"}]}
